questions.question: About how long have you been smoking this brand?

additional_info.packaging: Does it have something in the pack?

message.body: Some of America's leading brands need your help! By sponsoring this survey they hope to learn more about your family's lifestyle and the products you use. Please return this survey within the next 10 days. It's IMPORTANT TO US AND TO YOU... In return for your help these brands will be better able to develop new products and promotional offers which appeal to you most. Send you announcements about these new offers and products as they become available. 'Thanks' for your help!
